title: Wall Street Breakfast May 29: U.S.-China Tension Ratchets Up
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Global markets are jittery after China's parliament moved forward with national security legislation for Hong Kong and with President Trump holding a press conference later today on potential sanctions on Chinese officials. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
